actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to protect funds invested in series E United States savings bonds from inflation and to encourage persons to provide for their own security.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income interest received on the redemption of Series E United States savings bonds if the purchasing power of such interest and the price paid for the bonds in less than the purchasing power of the price paid for such bonds.

titles.title: A bill to protect funds invested in series E United States savings bonds from inflation and to encourage persons to provide for their own security.
